title: Double Standards Dealing With the Opposite Gender
itunes:title: Double Standards Dealing With the Opposite Gender
description:
Join Megan Wyatt as she answers Wives of Jannah community member marriage related questions from her inbox. This episode addresses a wife whose husband professed before marriage to have very strict standards on dealing with the opposite gender but bends the rules for himself while being upset with his wife when she doesn't meet his specific standards. 

 

To ask a question of your own visit: www.wivesofjanah.com/askaquestion
content:encoded:
